metadata.title: CVE-2024-11669 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 16.9.8before 17.4.5, 17.5 before 17.5.3, and 17.6 before 17.6.1. Certain APIendpoints could potentially allow unauthorized access to sensitive data dueto overly broad application of token scopes.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
